mean_cn: v. 凝视，注视；  n. 凝视，注视
mean_en: to look steadily at somebody/something for a long time, either because you are very interested or surprised, or because you are thinking of something else
sentence: The man on the beach is gazing at the woman near the water.
sentence_trans: 男人站在沙滩上，深情地凝视着那个海边的女人。
